de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools

Class MarsPositionSelectionPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gsi.chart.plugins.ChartPlugin
      • de.mpg.biochem.mars.fx.plot.tools.MarsPositionSelectionPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarsPlotPlugin

    public class MarsPositionSelectionPlugin
extends de.gsi.chart.plugins.ChartPlugin
implements MarsPlotPlugin
    Position along X or Y axis. Position selection - triggered on MOUSE_PRESSED event that is accepted by getPositionInMouseFilter() position-in filter. released.
    Author:
    Karl Duderstadt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.function.Predicate<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> defaultPositionSelectionMouseFilter
      Default region mouse filter passing on left mouse button (only).

      • setPositionSelectionMouseFilter

        public void setPositionSelectionMouseFilter(java.util.function.Predicate<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> positionSelectionMouseFilter)
        Sets filter on DRAG_DETECTED events that should start region-in operation.
        Parameters:
        positionSelectionMouseFilter - the filter to accept region-in mouse event. If null then any DRAG_DETECTED event will start region-in operation. By default it's set to defaultregionInMouseFilter.
